question: Which of the following ports in India have a free trade zone?
explanation: Kandla has free trade zone for Special Economic Zone (KASEZ). It was earlier known as the Kandla Free Trade Zone and is located at the port town Gandhidham in the state of Gujarat. One of the most significant features of this special economic zone at Kandla is that it is strictly a union government zone amidst others with more of private participation.
